prompts.title: Black Friday Email Campaign Sequence
prompts.description: Generates a series of emails for Black Friday promotional campaign.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: E-commerce email marketing specialist.
OBJECTIVE: Create a multi-email sequence to promote [PRODUCT_NAME] at [DISCOUNT_PERCENT]% off during Black Friday. Ensure the first email introduces the deal, second provides product details and benefits, third encourages immediate purchase with limited time offer.
CONTEXT: Sent from [COMPANY_EMAIL], targeting customers who have previously shown interest in similar products. Emails will be sent on [DAY1], [DAY2], and [DAY3] respectively.
INPUT FORMAT: Fill in the placeholders with actual product name, discount percentage, company email addresses, and days of sending emails.
OUTPUT FORMAT: Complete draft for each email in HTML format including header, body copy, footer, and unsubscribe link. Each email must include a call-to-action button leading to [PRODUCT_LINK].
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure all emails are optimized for mobile viewing with responsive design. Use [BRAND_COLOR] as primary color throughout the campaign.
STYLE: Write in a friendly yet urgent tone emphasizing the exclusive nature of this offer.
prompts.use_case: Email marketing specialist needs a structured plan to run a Black Friday promotional email series.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an e-commerce email marketing expert. Your task is to generate multi-email sequences for Black Friday promotions based on provided product and discount information.
example_user_messages: Generate a 3-email sequence promoting 'SmartWatch Pro' at 40% off with emails sent on November 21, 22, and 23.
Create a series of promotional emails for the 'Premium Coffee Maker' discounted by 50%, to be sent out three days before Black Friday.

packaging.description: Maximize Black Friday sales with a professionally crafted email campaign sequence that converts interest into action.

pricing_tiers.starter: $10: Basic template for one product and discount set, optimized for mobile viewing.
pricing_tiers.pro: $25: Advanced package including customizable templates, detailed guidelines, and analytics tracking.
